details: adds a modal that appears after saving an entry with next steps
modifies edit link to take user to the year field
added timeline entry edit mode and entry form
added buttons to download/upload custom timelines
added How to Run instructions and more to README
added of Lancer: Battlegroup timeline entries
links in the Sources table now open in a new tab
added All Factions and All Sources filter buttons and faction/source data
added No Room for Wallflower Act I data
added flag to sources to filter out specified sources by default
fixed timeline entry links to open in a new tab
removed empty faction circles from entries and button for no-faction
fixed scrolling issue with timeline entry link
consolidated notice and site update code to 2-column top bar

messages.title: TIMELINE EDITING IS LIVE!!!
messages.message: Scroll to Timeline Data Entry and click on the "Toggle Edit Mode" button to begin building your own custom timeline!
